title: Enhancing Patient Care Practical Competencies: Customized Project-Based Learning Design for Physics Concept Understanding

context.prior_knowledge: High School-Level Foundational Physics Knowledge or Intuitive Understanding Based on Daily Experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can solve problems in daily life and professional fields by applying Newton’s laws of motion and the concept of force.
Learners can quantitatively analyze the relationship between motion changes and force interactions.
Learners can identify peers’ misconceptions based on survey results and provide customized explanations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
